mapper.select: select g.id,g.goods_name,IFNULL(count(g.id),0) as cnt,o.cook_name from dc_order o , dc_combo_goods cg, dc_goods g WHERE o.combo_id = cg.combo_id and cg.goods_id = g.id AND o.order_date >= #{startDate} AND o.order_date <= #{endDate} AND o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 0 AND cg.del_flag = 0 AND g.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY g.id,o.cook_name ORDER BY cnt desc
